title: CNEAT
description: A schema defining a CNEAT analysis configuration

cne.description: A string holding the CNE sequence in FASTA format

rna_protein.description: A boolean representing whether or not the RNA-protein analysis pipeline should be executed

rna_protein_config.description: Additional configuration options for the RNA-protein analysis pipeline

drosophila_melanogaster.description: A boolean representing whether or not Drosophila melanogaster is relevant in this analysis

homo_sapiens.description: A boolean representing whether or not Homo sapiens is relevant in this analysis

mus_musculus.description: A boolean representing whether or not Mus musculus is relevant in this analysis

rna_rna.description: A boolean representing whether or not the RNA-RNA analysis pipeline should be executed

rna_rna_config.description: Additional configuration options for the RNA-protein analysis pipeline

query_sequences.description: A string holding the query sequence(s) in FASTA format

inta.description: A boolean representing whether or not the IntaRNA pipeline should be executed

inta_config.description: Additional configuration options for the IntaRNA analysis pipeline

prediction_mode.description: The mode of prediction used by the IntaRNA executable (H=heuristic, M=exact)

minpu.description: A float representing minimum unpaired probability of returned results

vienna.description: A boolean representing whether or not the ViennaRNA pipeline should be executed

vienna_config.description: Additional configuration options for the ViennaRNA analysis pipeline

rnacofold.description: A boolean representing whether or not the RNAcofold executable should be run

rnacofold_config.description: Additional configuration options for the RNAcofold executable

rnaduplex.description: A boolean representing whether or not the RNAduplex executable should be run

rnaduplex_config.description: Additional configuration options for the RNAduplex executable

deltaenergy.description: A float representing the energy range for returned sub-optimal interactions, in kcal/mol
